c74object.name: midi.mixer
c74object.description: Utility to map send and receive object with a MIDI-Controller. A json file is used to configure the object. Support multiple page, screen, fader touch and different fader volume mapping integrated.

inlet.digest: Message: double click on the object to see the view

objarg.name: configurationFile
objarg.description: JSON File. Configuration of the MIDI mixer. Should live next to your patch.

method.name: edit
method.description: Open editor for the configuration file.

method.name: config
method.description: Select a new configuration file, should live next to your patch.

method.name: controller
method.description: Ask server for selected fader mapping.

method.name: device
method.description: Ask server to change Midi-In and Midi-Out configuration

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: Send getPorts to log available midi input device into Max Console.

attribute.name: controller
attribute.description: Send getDevices to log available midi mapping table into Max Console. Midi Mapping Table is used for volume mapping. Add your own into the Controllers directory.
